greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Decimal expansion of the angle (in degrees) between an edge and (the normal of) a face of the regular tetrahedron.
comment: Also known as "magic angle", the angle t such that 3*(cos t)^2 - 1 = 0.
See more comments in A195696. - _Stanislav Sykora_, Nov 14 2013
formula: A195696 times 180 divided through Pi, see A072097.
results.author: _Omar E. Pol_, Jul 17 2012
